author: Bryan Mims, Heather Leah
title: Police prepare as trucker convoy of protesters potentially heads towards Raleigh
description: Preparations were underway at the legislative building on Thursday. Raleigh police have placed "No Parking" signs on streets surrounding the building, and the parking ban extends from 8 a.m. on Friday until 5 p.m. on Sunday.
content:
By Bryan Mims, WRAL reporter
Raleigh, N.C. — As truckers from across the country head to Washington to protest COVID mandates, North Carolina State Capitol Police are preparing for a possible truck … [+1572 chars]
